metadata.description:
Pablo Picasso (1881-1973)  
_Le peintre et son modèle_  
Signed _Picasso_ (lower right); dated _20.11.64_ (on the reverse)  
Oil on canvas  
46 by 55 cm; 18 ⅛ by 21 ⅝ in.  
Painted on November 20, 1964.

__Provenance:__  
Galerie Louise Leiris, Paris  
Private Collection (acquired _circa_ 1980)  
Private Collection, Europe (by descent from the above and sold: Sotheby's, Paris, December 3, 2013, lot 20)  
Purchased at the above sale by the present owner

__Literature:__  
Christian Zervos, _Pablo Picasso. Oeuvres de 1964_, vol. 24, Paris, 1971, no. 277, illustrated pl. 108

First scanned at Sotheby's New York, 1334 York Ave., NY, NY 10021 on Thursday May 20, 2021 at 9:44:01 EDT.
metadata.name: MIRAImage no. 1
